name: @assetlayer/sdk
description: Manage your assets with the Asset Layer SDK / API
author: Asset Layer

scripts.build: rimraf dist && microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.json --no-sourcemap && npm run build-umd && npm run build-umd-public
scripts.build-umd: microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.json --no-sourcemap --no-pkg-main -o dist/index.umd.js --format umd --external none --name AssetLayer
scripts.build-umd-public: microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.json --no-sourcemap --no-pkg-main -o public/index.umd.js --format umd --external none --name AssetLayer
